page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: {PERSONAL TRANSPORT}All householders except 3 have one or more motor cars. Some children own bicycles and young teenagers motorcycles. {ROADS}There are no major ("A") roads. A "B" road links the village with Basingstoke and Alresford and "C" roads lead to trunk roads linking the villages of Northington and Swarraton with larger towns. {PUBLIC TRANSPORT}A bus runs through the village to Alresford and back on 3 mornings a week. {SCHOOL TRANSPORT}A free bus service is provided to take children to and from Preston Candover School.
